iti101:0.3: The Chapter on the Holy Offering of the Teaching
iti101:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti101:2.1: “Mendicants, these four trifles are easy to find and are blameless.
iti101:2.5: Lodgings at the root of a tree …
iti101:2.7: These four trifles are easy to find and are blameless.
iti101:2.8: When a mendicant is content with trifles that are easy to find, they have one of the factors of the ascetic life, I say.”
iti101:2.9: That is what the Buddha said.
